snp3.6:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
snp3.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sabhiyassa paribbājakassa purāṇasālohitāya devatāya pañhā uddiṭṭhā honti:
snp3.6:1.4: “yo te, sabhiya, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime pañhe puṭṭho byākaroti tassa santike brahmacariyaṃ careyyāsī”ti.
snp3.6:2.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako tassā devatāya santike te pañhe uggahetvā ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṃghino gaṇino gaṇācariyā ñātā yasassino titthakarā sādhusammatā bahujanassa, seyyathidaṃ—
snp3.6:2.2: pūraṇo kassapo makkhaligosālo ajito kesakambalo pakudho kaccāno sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto—
snp3.6:2.4: Te sabhiyena paribbājakena pañhe puṭṭhā na sampāyanti;
snp3.6:3.2: “ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṅghino gaṇino gaṇācariyā ñātā yasassino titthakarā sādhusammatā bahujanassa, seyyathidaṃ—
snp3.6:3.4: te mayā pañhe puṭṭhā nasampāyanti, asampāyantā kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaronti;
snp3.6:4.2: “ayampi kho samaṇo gotamo saṅghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa;
snp3.6:4.3: yannūnāhaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ime pañhe puccheyyan”ti.
snp3.6:5.2: “yepi kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā jiṇṇā vuḍḍhā mahallakā addhagatā vayo anuppattā therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṃghino gaṇino gaṇācariyā ñātā yasassino titthakarā sādhusammatā bahujanassa, seyyathidaṃ—
snp3.6:5.4: tepi mayāpañhe puṭṭhā na sampāyanti, asampāyantā kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaronti, api ca maññevettha paṭipucchanti;
snp3.6:5.5: kiṃ pana me samaṇo gotamo ime pañhe puṭṭho byākarissati.
snp3.6:5.6: Samaṇo hi gotamo daharo ceva jātiyā, navo ca pabbajjāyā”ti.
snp3.6:6.2: “samaṇo kho daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhotabbo.
snp3.6:6.3: Daharopi cesa samaṇo gotamo mahiddhiko hoti mahānubhāvo, yannūnāhaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ime pañhe puccheyyan”ti.
snp3.6:7.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako yena rājagahaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
snp3.6:7.2: Anupubbenacārikaṃ caramāno yena rājagahaṃ veḷuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpo, yena bhagavātenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
snp3.6:7.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sabhiyoparibbājako bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
snp3.6:11.3: Yaṃ vatāhaṃ aññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu okāsakamma mattampi nālatthaṃ taṃme idaṃ samaṇena gotamena okāsakammaṃ katan”ti.
snp3.6:11.4: Attamano pamudito udaggo pītisomanassajāto bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi—
snp3.6:14.4: Ussadā yassa na santi sorato so.
snp3.6:17.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā attamano pamudito udaggo pītisomanassajāto bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃapucchi—
snp3.6:23.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako …pe… bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchi—
snp3.6:29.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako …pe… bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchi—
snp3.6:35.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako …pe… bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchi—
snp3.6:39.4: Paṭighā yassa na santi caraṇavā so.
snp3.6:41.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā attamano pamudito udaggo pītisomanassajāto uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
snp3.6:52.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
snp3.6:52.3: esāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca;
snp3.6:52.4: labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
snp3.6:53.1: “Yo kho, sabhiya, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, so cattāro māse parivasati;
snp3.6:53.2: catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti, upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
snp3.6:54.1: “Sace, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhantā pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhantā upasampadaṃ cattāro māse parivasanti, catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti, upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya, ahaṃ cattāri vassāni parivasissāmi;
snp3.6:54.2: catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu upasampādentu bhikkhubhāvāyā”ti.
snp3.6:54.3: Alattha kho sabhiyo paribbājako bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ alattha upasampadaṃ …pe…
snp3.6:54.4: aññataro kho panāyasmā sabhiyo arahataṃ ahosīti.
